top10_tweets_like:
anyflights v0.3.0 is now on CRAN!🛩️ Generate #nycflights13-like datasets for any recent year and US airports. In this release, new progress updates during download, performance improvements, and R-cmd-check-passing conversion to data package.🌼 #rstats

https://t.co/gIexI0MSKn https://t.co/xFxvpizk7D

This week's #TidyTuesday is based on data from Avatar: The Last Airbender! 💧🌏🔥💨

It's a perfect opportunity for y'all to use the Avatar #ggplot2 themes & color palettes in my {tvthemes} #rstats package! 😉

🔗: https://t.co/psEVIhY1Fs https://t.co/AnVyQu9Su3 https://t.co/t05IdJWIlj

The @R4DScommunity welcomes you to week 33 of #TidyTuesday!  We're exploring Avatar: The Last Airbender!

📂 https://t.co/sElb4fcv3u
🗞 https://t.co/ypdyGYgAeC

#r4ds #tidyverse #rstats #dataviz https://t.co/4BkMZjAEpJ

In this #tidytuesday screencast, we analyzed the energy production of European countries 🔌⚡️🌬️

My favorite part was trying out ggflag (my first time), and showing how I go about learning and debugging an unfamiliar package 🇩🇪🇹🇷🇫🇷🇳🇴🇬🇧

https://t.co/CelFyzYc8e #rstats https://t.co/Rb77WzubVD

Anyone know if Apple or gcc developers are actively working on getting gfortran working with Apple Silicon? The lack of a fortran compiler means #rstats cannot be compiled with Apple Silicon.

From https://t.co/TutOUwph9o it is unclear to me if anyone is actually working on this.
List of R functions and packages for visualization and analysis of multivariate data: https://t.co/2W9oB17Xpx #rstats

Want to learn how to make fast, interactive and web-ready US county-level maps in #rstats using Mapbox or D3? 

🖥️: https://t.co/7AfAWsJW4R
📝: https://t.co/AUJgfGBC64 https://t.co/AR8JLGedVC

In celebration of reaching 1k citations, I made my @github profile README self-updating with the latest Google Scholar citation counts scraped with {rvest} #rstats 📦 and GitHub Actions!

Kudos to #tidyverse team for such great efforts! 🍻

Check it out: https://t.co/TUot83OBcO https://t.co/GvGzMGhmZD

Again: it’s apparently totally fine with @Apple that no numerical software will work on their new hardware. No #JuliaLang. No #RStats. No #NumPy. Port a damned #fortran compiler, Apple! https://t.co/EVpO6RxuoF
